short_summary: Forms Management Stocked Form Production, Storage and Shipment
description: The Forms Management (FM) team is responsible for producing all official form templates (artwork) for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) and has a requirement to have printed versions of certain templates.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

##  Forms Management Stocked Form Production, Storage and Shipment

### Solicitation and Tender Information

*   **Solicitation Number:** 2023-00505
*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 31st, 2023 at 2:00 PM
*   **Publication Date:** December 15th, 2022
*   **Amendment Date:** January 27th, 2023

### Request for Proposal Overview

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency invites interested contractors to submit a proposal to provide forms management stocked form production, storage, and shipment services. The selected contractor will be responsible for printing, storing, and shipping officially approved forms to support the mandate of the CFIA.

## Key Responsibilities

*   Print, store, and ship officially approved forms
*   Maintain a stock level of forms to ensure operational continuity
*   Provide reporting to CFIA to allow for decisions regarding quantities to maintain
*   Update artwork as required by CFIA

## Additional Information

*   The selected contractor will be required to provide forms with security features as specified by the CFIA
*   Forms can be shipped to various locations across Canada
*   Consideration may be given to contractors with experience in working with sensitive information and confidential documents

## Attachments

The solicitation package includes the following attachments:

*   [2023-00505 – RFP HC High Complexity](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/feb6f7bdd8302d23b837e54dac1ec7d7/2023-00505_-_rfp_hc_high_complexity.pdf)
*   [2023-00505 – Amendment 1 English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/26/feb6f7bdd8302d23b837e54dac1ec7d7/2023-00505_-_addendum_1_english.pdf)

## Important Dates

*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 31st, 2023 at 2:00 PM
*   **Amendment Date:** January 27th, 2023

Contact Information:

*   Bennett, Ashley
*   Email: Ashley.Bennett@inspection.gc.ca

Please note that the tender has already expired, which is why the `Tender Status` field in your original message reads "Expired" and
